title: vErillai nIyE
sahitya:
vErillai nIyE gati pashupati veLLi malai vAzh gaurIpatE enakku


anupallavi

  mIrum poi vanja shErAm prapancam mIduran kanjat-tAlanri tanjam


caraNam    murp-pirappil sheida tIvinaiyAlE ippirappil mAya vashappDalAnOm
 arppar vAzha unran meyyanpar tunbural aruLO emakku inba vAzhvum uNDO
